bill_title: expand eligibility for the health insurance risk pool.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to expand eligibility for the health insurance risk pool. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 58-17 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any South Dakota resident who has an individual health benefit plan and pays premium rates in excess of twenty-five percent of the highest premium rate charged by the risk pool is eligible for health insurance coverage under the risk pool established in § 58-17-115. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
